entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
